019
020package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.meta;
021
022import java.io.File;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.OutputStream;
025import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
026import java.nio.file.Files;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.stream.Stream;
031
032import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.AbstractAutomaticBean.OutputStreamOptions;
033import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.Checker;
034import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.DefaultConfiguration;
035import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.MetadataGeneratorLogger;
036import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.TreeWalker;
037import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.CheckstyleException;
038
039/** Class which handles all the metadata generation and writing calls. */
040public final class MetadataGeneratorUtil {
041
042    /** Stop instances being created. **/
043    private MetadataGeneratorUtil() {
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Generate metadata from the module source files available in the input argument path.
048     *
049     * @param path arguments
050     * @param out OutputStream for error messages
051     * @param moduleFolders folders to check
052     * @throws IOException ioException
053     * @throws CheckstyleException checkstyleException
054     */
055    public static void generate(String path, OutputStream out, String... moduleFolders)
056            throws IOException, CheckstyleException {
057        JavadocMetadataScraper.resetModuleDetailsStore();
058
059        final Checker checker = new Checker();
060        checker.setModuleClassLoader(Checker.class.getClassLoader());
061        final DefaultConfiguration scraperCheckConfig =
062                        new DefaultConfiguration(JavadocMetadataScraper.class.getName());
063        final DefaultConfiguration defaultConfiguration =
064                new DefaultConfiguration("configuration");
065        final DefaultConfiguration treeWalkerConfig =
066                new DefaultConfiguration(TreeWalker.class.getName());
067        defaultConfiguration.addProperty("charset", StandardCharsets.UTF_8.name());
068        defaultConfiguration.addChild(treeWalkerConfig);
069        treeWalkerConfig.addChild(scraperCheckConfig);
070        checker.configure(defaultConfiguration);
071
072        checker.addListener(new MetadataGeneratorLogger(out, OutputStreamOptions.NONE));
073
074        final List<File> moduleFiles = getTargetFiles(path, moduleFolders);
075
076        checker.process(moduleFiles);
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Get files that represent modules.
081     *
082     * @param moduleFolders folders to check
083     * @param path          rootPath
084     * @return files for scrapping javadoc and generation of metadata files
085     * @throws IOException ioException
086     */
087    private static List<File> getTargetFiles(String path, String... moduleFolders)
088            throws IOException {
089        final List<File> validFiles = new ArrayList<>();
090        for (String folder : moduleFolders) {
091            try (Stream<Path> files = Files.walk(Path.of(path + "/" + folder))) {
092                validFiles.addAll(
093                        files.map(Path::toFile)
094                        .filter(file -> {
095                            final String fileName = file.getName();
096                            return fileName.endsWith("SuppressWarningsHolder.java")
097                                    || fileName.endsWith("Check.java")
098                                    || fileName.endsWith("Filter.java");
099                        })
100                        .toList());
101            }
102        }
103
104        return validFiles;
105    }
106}
